text:
“Hailey needed one thing lovely and female that was pulled off the face to go with the strains of the gown,” the sweetness professional stated. “We initially have been going to do an extended model of the look however after she had the gown on we realized brief can be higher fitted to the completed look so we minimize it blunt and fluffy.”

Love Hailey Baldwin ‘s fluffed bob? You possibly can thank superstar hairstylist Justine Marjan and Hidden Crown Hair Clip-in Extensions.

From easy hacks to magnificence tips that make these execs borderline genius, our routines can be endlessly grateful.

The mannequin’s hair hack is simply the start. Take a look at extra ideas from prime superstar hairstylists and make-up artists under!

Dia Dipasupil/Getty Photographs Sarah Hyland

Hairstylist Ryan Richman positioned a hair primer, Paul Mitchell Neuro Prime, which reduces the speed of warmth switch, earlier than utilizing scorching instruments on her hair.

JEAN-BAPTISTE LACROIX/AFP/Getty Pictures Janelle Monae

For a wholesome, purple carpet glow, make-up artist Jessica Smalls utilized Marc Jacobs Magnificence Glow Stick Glistening Illuminator in Highlight seven hundred above her cheeks and to her forehead bones, a spot that many highlighter lovers miss.

Frederick M. Brown/FilmMagic Sarah Paulson

“For me, what actually made this look was the pop of pink underneath the attention (Tom Ford Eyeshadow Excessive in TFX3, out March 5) and the daring lip (Tom Ford Boys & Women Lip Shade in Jared 05),” stated make-up artist Adam Breuchaud. “Do not be afraid to attempt a enjoyable, sudden shade underneath a cleaner, extra normal eye.”

Ann/Patrick McMullan by way of Getty Photographs Sofia Vergara

Over Sofia’s basis, magnificence professional Kayleen McAdams utilized the newly launched Charlotte Tilbury Hollywood Flawless Filter in shade 6, a tinted complexion booster that was designed to work like a Snapchat filter.

John Shearer/Getty Pictures Gabrielle Union

To set the Being Mary Jane star’s make-up, magnificence professional Fiona Stiles used Cowl FX Good Setting Powder, a talc-free components that an anti-obtrusive impact in entrance of flashing cameras.

JEAN-BAPTISTE LACROIX/AFP/Getty Pictures Olivia Munn

To create Olivia’s look, hairstylist Chad Wooden braided the again of her hair to lower thickness, then added extensions for size. For added gloss, he glazed the ends of her hair with the Sisley-Paris Hair Rituel Valuable Hair Care Oil, which launched on February sixth.

Taylor Hill/FilmMagic Amanda Seyfried

After making use of the Suave Professionals Hairspray Compressed Micro Mist Pure Maintain to the actress’ hair, stylist Jenny Cho moved her flat iron within the form of an “S” to realize silky waves.

Jon Kopaloff/WireImage Rosie Huntington-Whiteley

Previous to the get together, superstar tanning professional James Learn utilized a number of skinny layers of his namesake Coconut Water Tan Mist Physique to Rosie’s physique. “I needed the pores and skin to have a pleasant delicate base shade to enrich her entire look,” he stated.

Presley Ann/Patrick McMullan by way of Getty Pictures Rashida Jones

Earlier than beginning the actress’ magnificence routine, make-up artist Jamie Greenberg prepped her pores and skin together with her drugstore should-have: the Almay Oil Free Make-up Remover Towelettes.

George Pimentel/WireImage Hailey Baldwin

After making use of the extensions, hairstylist Justine Marjan used the ghd curve Tender Curl Iron and texturizing spray to mix the hair and add a bend. With slightly again-brushing and hairspray, she achieved the quantity seen on the pink carpet.

Dia Dipasupil/Getty Photographs Lily Aldridge

To prep Lily’s lips, make-up artist Quinn Murphy used L’Occitane Licensed Natural Pure Shea Butter as a primer to the nude lipstick, so her lips would keep moist all through the night.
